CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sector Beta relative to Stellar City Core?
SRP.A: Sector Beta is {above} Stellar City Core in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sector Beta relative to District Alpha?
SRP.A: Sector Beta is {below} District Alpha in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Enclave relative to Verdant Ward?
SRP.A: Azure Enclave is {above} Verdant Ward in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Verdant Ward}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Outer Rim Settlements}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Outer Rim Settlements's minimum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Outer Rim Settlements's minimum Vaccination Rate is in {1999}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Quarter's minimum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Quarter's minimum Vaccination Rate is in {1987}.

NC.Q: Was the total Vaccination Rate in 1986 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total vaccination rate in 1986 was {lower} than in 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Vaccination Rate in 1988 higher or lower than in 1992?
NC.A: The total vaccination rate in 1988 was {lower} than in 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1993, was the average total Vaccination Rate higher or lower than between 1986 and 1998?
NC.A: The average total vaccination rate between 1990 and 1993 was {higher} than between 1986 and 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1995, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 1988 and 1995 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Quarter} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Outer Rim Settlements and Stellar City Core first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Outer Rim Settlements and Stellar City Core first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
